titlestmt.titleproper: Inventory of the Umam lil-Tawthīq wa-al-Ȧbḥāth (أمم للتوثيق والأبحاث) publications
Umam lil-Tawthīq wa-al-Ȧbḥāth (أمم للتوثيق والأبحاث) publications
titlestmt.author: Finding aid prepared by Heather Hughes

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using the Archivists' Toolkit 2017-05-26T08:38-0700
profiledesc.langusage: Finding aid is written in English

did.unittitle: Umam lil-Tawthīq wa-al-Ȧbḥāth (أمم للتوثيق والأبحاث) publications
did.abstract: Pamphlets, booklets, and other issuances relating to conflict in Lebanon.

accessrestrict.head: Access
accessrestrict.p: The collection is open for research.

The Hoover Institution Archives only allows access to copies of audiovisual items. To listen to sound recordings or to view videos or films during your visit, please contact the Archives at least two working days before your arrival. We will then advise you of the accessibility of the material you wish to see or hear. Please note that not all audiovisual material is immediately accessible.

userestrict.head: Publication Rights
userestrict.p: For copyright status, please contact the Hoover Institution Archives.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Identification of item], Umam lil-Tawthīq wa-al-Ȧbḥāth (أمم للتوثيق والأبحاث) publications, [Box no.], Hoover Institution Archives.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Materials were acquired by the Hoover Institution Archives in 2017.

accruals.head: Accruals
accruals.p: Materials may have been added to the collection since this finding aid was prepared. To determine if this has occurred, find the collection in Stanford University's online catalog at http://searchworks.stanford.edu/. Materials have been added to the collection if the number of boxes listed in the catalog is larger than the number of boxes listed in this finding aid.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Material
relatedmaterial.p: Maddox, Katherine Nora. "Archiving the Present in Beirut’s Southern Suburb: Memory, History, and Power at Umam Documentation and Research." Master's thesis, University of Texas at Austin, 2016. https://repositories.lib.utexas.edu/bitstream/handle/2152/38187/MADDOX-THESIS-2016.pdf.

bioghist.head: Historical Note
bioghist.p: Umam lil-Tawthīq wa-al-Ȧbḥāth (أمم للتوثيق والأبحاث) (UMAM Documentation and Research) is a non-profit organization based in Beirut, Lebanon and dedicated to documenting Lebanon’s past, specifically focusing on conflict and war, with the goal of making these resources available to the citizens of Lebanon.
For more information about the organization, see their website, http://www.umam-dr.org.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content of Collection
scopecontent.p: Pamphlets, booklets, and other issuances relating to conflict in Lebanon.

did.unittitle: عائد من جهنم : ذكريات من تدمر و أخواته (ʻĀʼid min jahannam : dhikrayāt min Tadmur wa-akhawātih),
"بالروح، بالدم-- : دراسة إحصائية في أحوال عينة من مقاتلي "الحرب (Bi-al-rūḥ, bi-al-dam-- : dirāsah iḥṣāʼīyah fī aḥwāl ʻayyinah min muqātilī "al-ḥarb"),

p.title: To the Death : A Survey of the Continuing Experiences from Lebanon’s Civil Wars

did.unittitle: [1945-2015] حتى إشعار آخر--: قصص قصيرة من سيرة المحكمة العسكرية في لبنان (Hattá ishʻār ākhar--: min sīrat al-Maḥkamah al-ʻaskarīyah fī Lubnān [1945-2015])

odd.head: English Translation
odd.p: Until Further Notice--: Snapshots of Lebanon’s Military Court [1945-2015]

did.unittitle: دليل اللبنانيين إلى السلم والحرب : ديوان الذاكرة اللبنانية (Dalīl al-Lubnānīyīn al-salām wa-al-ḥarb : dīwān al-dhākirah al-Lubnānīyah),

p.title: A Guide for Lebanese on Peace and War : Memory at Work

did.unittitle: مفاتيح السجن السوري : مصطلحات من وراء القضبان (Mafātīḥ al-sijn al-Sūrī : muṣṭalaḥāt min warāʼ al-quḍbān),

p.title: Keys to the Syrian Prison : Words from Behind the Bars

did.unittitle: السلام عليكم : نزاعات لبنان في محاولات إنهائها (Al-Salām ʻalaykum : nizāʻāt Lubnān fī muḥāwalāt inhāʼihā),

p.title: Peace upon You : Revisiting Past Attempts to End Lebanon’s Conflicts

did.unittitle: عن ستوديو بعلبك ومنازل لبنانية أخرى (ʻAn stūdiyū Baʻlabakk wa-manāzil Lubnānīyah ukhrá),

p.title: Sur les Studios Baalbeck et autres lieux de mémoire au Liban / About Baalbeck Studios and Other Lebanese Sites of Memory
